channel.title: New Server--Notorious317!
channel.description:
Hello great Moparscape community!
This is sakoo99 AKA Mathy bringing you a brand new awesome 317 server called Notorious 317! It has great Pking system and a great ECO with great Owner!
Here are some awesome features of the server : Core re-work for great server stability Friendly and active community Duo Slayer Dwarf multi cannon In game PvP highscores Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding Flawless combat system Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits All skills fully working and being worked on every day Daily server and website updates A hard working owner who listens to his players Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items! Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime Fast combat XP rates so you can get right in and pk Max cape for players who accomplish all 99's Highscores and auto donations
There are MANY more features so come and see for yourself! Download link! : http://www.notorious317.org/Notorious.jar You can also take a look at: http://notorious317.org/forum/
There aren't a lot of players which make it a great server but there's enough players to have a great PK experience!
Thanks for reading! :D
Sakoo99 AKA Mathy

item.title: New Server--Notorious317!
item.dc:creator: @sakoo99 sakoo99
item.description:
@sakoo99 wrote:

Hello great Moparscape community!

This is sakoo99 AKA Mathy bringing you a brand new awesome 317 server called Notorious 317! It has great Pking system and a great ECO with great Owner!

Here are some awesome features of the server :
Core re-work for great server stability
Friendly and active community
Duo Slayer
Dwarf multi cannon
In game PvP highscores
Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding
Flawless combat system
Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable
A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits
All skills fully working and being worked on every day
Daily server and website updates
A hard working owner who listens to his players
Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops
Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items!
Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage
Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking
The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime
Fast combat XP rates so you can get right in and pk
Max cape for players who accomplish all 99’s
Highscores and auto donations

There are MANY more features so come and see for yourself!
Download link! : http://www.notorious317.org/Notorious.jar
You can also take a look at: http://notorious317.org/forum/

There aren’t a lot of players which make it a great server but there’s enough players to have a great PK experience!

Thanks for reading!

Sakoo99 AKA Mathy
